subject: Re: Gateway MT6451
body:
On Thu, 19 Apr 2007 18:29:32 -0300
Andre Novelli  wrote:

[snip]

> Hello Friends!
> 
> 
> I had success in sound installation!!!
> I am using the 1.0.13 alsa version and passing some options to the module:
> 
> edited /etc/modprobe.d/sound  and inserted  a single row like below
> 
> 
> echo options snd-hda-intel probe_mask=3 position_fix=3
> 
> Now I can hear the sound! :D 
> 
> Thanks a lot!
> 
> Now I will make the sequence of my odissey: try to make my wireless and ATI Video card with 3d works! 

Good to hear that; thanks for telling us. Good luck going forward.

Celejar
